snippet: A questionnaire answered by over a million parents, teachers and students found a high level of satisfaction with the system, but the scores for some important measures declined....
abstract: New York City Education Dept's annual schools survey shows mixed results, with rise in overall satisfaction with public schools but drops in several key areas; survey questions have changed, precluding direct comparison with previous years.
lead_paragraph: A questionnaire answered by over a million parents, teachers and students found a high level of satisfaction with the system, but the scores for some important measures declined.

headline.main: Good and Bad News in Survey of New York City Schools
headline.print_headline: In City’s Survey of Schools, Good News and Some Bad
